Definition.name: Poly

Documentation.return: value of the polynomial at x
Documentation.firstline: Evaluate a polynomial from a set of co-effs
Documentation.content: Evaluate a polynomial from a set of co-effs. Co-effs 1 is assumed to be the HIGH order of the equation. Thus for ax^2+bx+c - the set would need to be Coef := [a,b,c];

param.name: x
param.desc: the value of x in the polynomial

param.name: Coeffs
param.desc: a set of coefficients forthe polynomial. The ALL set is considered to be all zero values

Definition.Signature: REAL8 Poly(REAL8 x, SET OF REAL8 Coeffs)

Documentation.return: value of the polynomial at x
Documentation.firstline: Evaluate a polynomial from a set of co-effs
Documentation.content: Evaluate a polynomial from a set of co-effs. Co-effs 1 is assumed to be the HIGH order of the equation. Thus for ax^2+bx+c - the set would need to be Coef := [a,b,c];

param.name: x
param.desc: the value of x in the polynomial

param.name: Coeffs
param.desc: a set of coefficients forthe polynomial. The ALL set is considered to be all zero values
